addBeneficiary((string,address,uint128)).details: The addeed percentage of the beneficiaries should not exceed 100%The total maximum percentage should be 100%

addToken(address).details: there is no function to remove a token since that can be done by decreasing the allowance of this contract. Doing otherwise would be expensive and unnecessary

params.token: The token to be added to the protected tokens list

createTestament(address,uint128,(string,.details: The beneficiaries percentages should be with an 18 decimals precision to allow for percentages with decimalsThe beneficiaries percentages should add up to 100%

params.beneficiaries: The beneficiaries that will inherit the vault

params.owner: The owner of the dynamic vault
The owner of the dynamic vault

returns.claimant: The claimant of the dynamic vault
returns.proofOfLife: The last registred proof of life timestamp
returns.succeeded: Whether the dynamic vault has been succeeded

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.owner: The owner of the dynamic vault

succeed(address).details: The function can only be called after the inactivity period is over

params.owner: The owner of the dynamic vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getBackupAddresses(address).notice: Returns the backup addresses of a given dynamic vault id

getTestamentParameters(address).notice: Returns the testament parameters of a given dynamic vault id

pause().notice: Stops all actions on all vaults

repossessAccount(address).notice: Transfers the protected tokens to the backup address

signalLife().notice: Updates the proof of life timestamp

succeed(address).notice: Transfers the tokens to the beneficiaries

unpause().notice: Unpause vaults. Makes actions available again on all vaults*

updateBeneficiaries(string[],address[],u.notice: Updates the inheritance percentage of a beneficiary

updateEstablishmentFeeRate(uint128).notice: Sets the global establishment fee rate*

updateInactivityMaximum(uint128).notice: Updates the inactivity time of thedynamicVault

userdoc.notice: Dyanmic vaults contract that allows for the transfer of tokens in case of emergency
